experiment.description: 基线实验 Hydra-Zen配置版 knowledge_num=1M epochs=10
experiment.command: python 1_pretrain.py training.epochs=1 model.knowledge_num=1024 model.dim=64 model.n_layers=2 training.batch_size=1 training.learning_rate=2e-4

data_checkout_steps: git checkout 28065662dcc2fbccfb47ada4147452adeb00d905 && dvc checkout data/database.dvc && git checkout -
git checkout cd7f9bb784c5dbfabf8193cbca40d66d99e3ba09 && dvc checkout data/benchmarks.dvc && git checkout -
reproduction.full_command:
# 1. 恢复代码版本
git checkout 45e5cbb6d499b2d658c00057bc584b21f493e8c2

# 2. 恢复数据集版本
git checkout 28065662dcc2fbccfb47ada4147452adeb00d905 && dvc checkout data/database.dvc && git checkout -

# 3. 恢复验证数据集版本
git checkout cd7f9bb784c5dbfabf8193cbca40d66d99e3ba09 && dvc checkout data/benchmarks.dvc && git checkout -

# 4. 拉取实验输出
dvc pull /home/pci/ExplicitLM/outputs/2025-11-02/16-00-43.dvc

# 5. 运行训练
python 1_pretrain.py training.epochs=1 model.knowledge_num=1024 model.dim=64 model.n_layers=2 training.batch_size=1 training.learning_rate=2e-4
